name: Aaron
description: Moses's brother, first High Priest. The mouthpiece, the supporter, essential partner. Flawed but faithful, the priest who blessed Israel.

blessing-people.name: Priestly Blessing
blessing-people.description: Hands raised pronouncing blessing over Israel
blessing-people.prompt: standing with hands raised in priestly blessing - wearing high priest garments with breastplate, pronouncing Aaronic blessing over the people, 'The Lord bless you and keep you'

rod-to-serpent.name: Rod to Serpent
rod-to-serpent.description: Casting rod before Pharaoh, becoming serpent
rod-to-serpent.prompt: casting rod to ground before Egyptian throne - rod mid-transformation into serpent, confident expression, demonstrating God's power to Pharaoh

standing-beside-moses.name: Beside Moses
standing-beside-moses.prompt: standing beside Moses in supportive position - the essential partner, ready to speak or act, two brothers united in mission

holding-up-moses-arms.name: Holding Moses's Arms
holding-up-moses-arms.description: Supporting Moses's tired arms during battle
holding-up-moses-arms.prompt: holding up Moses's raised arms during battle - supporting weary leader, Hur on other side, the battle won through support, essential role in victory

stopping-plague.name: Stopping the Plague
stopping-plague.description: Standing between living and dead with incense
stopping-plague.prompt: standing with incense censer between dead and living - smoke rising, plague stopping at his feet, the intercessor who stood in the gap and saved Israel

high-priest-garments.name: In Full Vestments
high-priest-garments.prompt: standing in full High Priest vestments - breastplate with twelve stones, ephod, turban with gold plate, 'for glory and for beauty', the weight of priestly office
